english.segment1: We come into this Holy place. To bring a sacrifice of praise. Bow down before you and seek your face
english.segment2: We sing of the mighty things you've done. Cry out to you. "let your will be done". Tell all the World you're the Holy One
english.segment3: Hear the shouts of praise. As they're rising up to you. Come and fill this place. As we bring glory to your name
english.segment4: Open up the gates and let the. King of glory in. Fill this house with praises as we. Lift our hands and worship you. Open up the doors and let your. Glory fill the earth. King of heaven we dance before your throne
english.segment5: King of heaven come and. Take your place. Dwell among us as we. Seek your face
